descriptionlist.longdescription:
• buy :: $1.00 الشـراء

    · custom color


    Refund Policy:
    · refund accepted if u have !issue such a safe mode or th tweak not working!
    · must provide full details about the !issue photo & crash log>
    · change in mind not accepted !u can see details with photos & video before buying,
    · if refund was accepted will proccess with in 3 to 7 days:
    · thank you 🤗 & Enjoy:


    Purchased before or Changing device : تم شراؤها من قبل أو تغيير الجهاز ?
